name: gitlab_get_pipeline_jobs
description: Get all jobs for a specific pipeline in a GitLab project. Returns job id, name, and status for each job. Use this tool to see all jobs within a pipeline and their current states.

project_id.description: The GitLab project ID or URL-encoded path (e.g., 'mygroup/myproject' or '12345'). Required to identify the project.

pipeline_id.description: The pipeline ID to get jobs for. You can get this from gitlab_get_latest_pipeline tool.

stage.description: The pipeline stage this job belongs to

jobs.description: List of jobs in the pipeline

total_count.description: Total number of jobs in the pipeline
